string-array.name: question_array
string-array.item: Can I make a reservation without signing in?
How can I check my reservation?
How can I charge coin?
How much time can I reserve?
How much does it cost?
What is the benefit of being a member?

string-array.name: answer_array
string-array.item: Yes. You can make a reservation without signing in if you have a phone number.

If you are signed in, you can check your reservation at the bottom of this page. If you are not signed in, you can check your reservation using your phone number which you submitted when making a reservation.
You can charge coin in "Coin" section of the next page. You can pay either with a VISA card, or with your Paypal/Amazon account.
You can reserve up to 3 hours in a single reservation. Also, you must reserve 30 minutes at least.
It costs 1000 coins for every 30 minutes.

1. You can use coin and send it to your friends.
 2. You can make a list of your favorite songs.
 3. You can participate in weekly polls.
